content: designed by michelle hillmeyer michelle@lulafayefiber com tunisian crochet mug rug special stitches & technique key ● end stitch es turn edge of fabric towards you insert hook under both bars vertical and the one crossed behind it of last st yo pull up a lp and leave it on hook ● return pass rtnp yo pull through 1 lp *yo pull through 2 lps repeat from * across until 1 lp remains on hook last lp on hook counts as first st of next row ● tunisian bind off tbo for all sts except last st insert hook under front vertical bar of next st yo pull lp up and through lp on hook as for a slip_stitch ● for last st es and continue pulling new lp through lp on hook ● tunisian simple stitch tss insert hook under front vertical bar of next st yo pull up a lp and leave it on hook ● tunisian knit stitch tks insert hook through center of next st from front to back between back and front vertical bars yo pull up a lp and leave it on hook notes materials ● to create a neat finished bottom edge work ● worsted weight #4 cotton yarn 20g foundation row in back bumps of starting chain ● tunisian crochet hook us j-10 / 6 00 mm at least ● the project will curl upwards from the bottom as 10 long shaft or with cable row are worked which is typical with tunisian ● yarn needle scissors measuring tape crochet and generally lessens as the piece gets longer blocking the finished project can help gauge flatten it ● 12 stitches x 11 5 row = 4 instructions dimensions foundation row with tunisian hook chain 16 pull up a ● approx 5 5 x 5 5 blocked lp in back bump of 2nd chain from hook and each rem stitch key chain rtnp 16 sts ● beg beginning note remember lp on hook at beg of row counts ● chain s chain s as first st do not work into first st unless instructed ● es end stitch row 1 tss in second and each st across to last st es ● lp loop rtnp 16 sts ● rem remaining row 2-3 repeat row 1 16 sts ● rtnp return pass row 4 tss in second and next sts tks in next 10 sts tss ● tbo tunisian bind off in next 2 sts es rtnp 16 sts ● tks tunisian knit stitch row 5-12 repeat row 4 16 sts ● tss tunisian simple stitch row 13-14 repeat row 1 16 sts ● st s stitch es row 15 tbo in next st and each st across cut yarn ● yo yarn over and fasten_off finishing weave in ends wet or steam block project to eliminate curl tunisian crochet mug rug project for intro to tunisian crochet students 1 designed
